name: Memory of an Adversary
description:
Created for Brackeys 2020.2 Game Jam with theme Rewind, Memory of an Adversary has you play with memories instead of health. Get hit, and return to a past version of yourself. Get hit with no memories however, and you will have to restart the level. Walking into your own memories also causes them to disappear

Controls

Move: A - left, D - right, W/Space - jump

Attack: K/Left Mouse Button

Assets used are listed below. If I did not credit you, please contact me ASAP so I can add your work to the list!

https://vnitti.itch.io/grassy-mountains-parallax-background

https://rvros.itch.io/pixel-art-animated-slime

https://xyezawr.itch.io/gif-free-pixel-effects-pack-5-blood-effects - altered

https://sanctumpixel.itch.io/forest-lite-pixel-art-tileset

https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero

https://onemansymphony.bandcamp.com/releases
